level.heading: Physical therapy assistants; references thereto.
level.text: For a period of 12 months following March 6, 2007, all references to a physical therapy assistant shall be deemed to refer to a person meeting the requirements for licensure in the District, regardless of whether that person is licensed in fact.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-220
level.text: For Law 16-220, see notes following ยง 3-1201.02.
